marklogic.body:
If only we could knock some SENSE into them!? It was something of a revelation for me as we've Always HAD a Caddy Plan and thought it was something of a waste?
All this "just in case you 'might' need it someday?" infrastructure going fallow. When Mrs. Will asks co-workers how they liked the Weight Loss support group or mental health check ups blah blah the usual response is: We're COVERED for 'that'!?
But most of it is only, wait for it.......... only available during working hours! So basically Free $$$ for the people that put these together.

object.displayName: Comment on Out: 'Individual Mandate' -- In: 'Personal Responsibility Clause' by Marshall_Will

marklogic.displayName: Marshall_Will commented on Out: 'Individual Mandate' -- In: 'Personal Responsibility Clause'
